General.Name: Kustur Kusadasi Turizm Endustrisi AS
General.Description: Kustur Kusadasi Turizm Endüstrisi A.S. operates holiday clubs in Turkey. Its clubs include restaurants, bars, pools and beaches, animation and sports, and Turkish bath facilities. The company's clubs also provide standard, superior, garden, family, and suite rooms. Kustur Kusadasi Turizm Endüstrisi A.S. was founded in 1968 and is based in Aydin, Turkey.

0.Name: Mr. Ozmettin  Kavasoglu
